messages.content:
[
  {
    "screen_number": 1,
    "voiceover_text": "Are your teams losing productivity due to fragmented workflows and disconnected tools?",
    "target_duration_sec": 7,
    "screen_type": "stock video",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "frustrated business professionals, multiple open apps, missed deadline notifications",
    "action_notes": "Quick montage of stressed teams juggling different software and receiving deadline alerts"
  },
  {
    "screen_number": 2,
    "voiceover_text": "Introducing FlowSync—the all-in-one platform for seamless project management and collaboration.",
    "target_duration_sec": 7,
    "screen_type": "slides/text overlay",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "FlowSync logo animation, modern interface elements, brand colors",
    "action_notes": "Logo reveal transitions smoothly into animated UI elements"
  },
  {
    "screen_number": 3,
    "voiceover_text": "Manage every project from a single, intuitive workspace.",
    "target_duration_sec": 6,
    "screen_type": "screencast",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "FlowSync dashboard, project cards, navigation sidebar",
    "action_notes": "Screen recording of dashboard navigation, highlighting project overview"
  },
  {
    "screen_number": 4,
    "voiceover_text": "Collaborate instantly with built-in chat and effortless file sharing.",
    "target_duration_sec": 6,
    "screen_type": "screencast",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "team chat window, file upload, sharing files in real time",
    "action_notes": "Cursor demonstrates sending a message and uploading a file"
  },
  {
    "screen_number": 5,
    "voiceover_text": "Assign tasks and keep everyone aligned, wherever they work.",
    "target_duration_sec": 6,
    "screen_type": "screencast",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "task assignment UI, notification pop-ups, remote team avatars",
    "action_notes": "User assigns a task, team members receive notifications"
  },
  {
    "screen_number": 6,
    "voiceover_text": "Monitor progress with AI-powered analytics and stay ahead of bottlenecks.",
    "target_duration_sec": 6,
    "screen_type": "slides/text overlay",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "AI analytics dashboard, progress graphs, milestone tracking",
    "action_notes": "Animated charts and graphs updating in real time"
  },
  {
    "screen_number": 7,
    "voiceover_text": "Integrate with Slack, Google Drive, Trello, Outlook, and more—no more switching between apps.",
    "target_duration_sec": 6,
    "screen_type": "slides/text overlay",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "integration logos, connecting lines to FlowSync interface",
    "action_notes": "Icons animate in and connect to FlowSync"
  },
  {
    "screen_number": 8,
    "voiceover_text": "Customize notifications and automate workflows to keep your team proactive.",
    "target_duration_sec": 6,
    "screen_type": "screencast",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "notification settings, workflow automation builder",
    "action_notes": "User sets up a custom notification and creates an automation rule"
  },
  {
    "screen_number": 9,
    "voiceover_text": "Perfect for remote and cross-functional teams managing complex projects from anywhere.",
    "target_duration_sec": 6,
    "screen_type": "stock video",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "diverse remote teams on video calls, collaborative digital workspaces",
    "action_notes": "Footage of professionals collaborating remotely, sharing screens and documents"
  },
  {
    "screen_number": 10,
    "voiceover_text": "Ready to boost your team’s productivity? Visit flowsync.com to start your free trial today!",
    "target_duration_sec": 4,
    "screen_type": "cta",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "website URL, free trial button, FlowSync branding",
    "action_notes": "Animated CTA overlay with website and free trial button"
  }
]
